GOURMET LC

View Menu

A CAFE EXPERIENCE LIKE NO OTHER

YOUR TASTEBUDS' DESTINATION
View our Menu

Welcome to Gourmet LC

Gourmet LC is your haven for exceptional coffee, artisanal teas, and irresistible baked goods! Whether you’re looking for a cozy spot to unwind or a quick pick-me-up, we are here to elevate your taste experience.


Join us for a delightful selection of handcrafted beverages and freshly baked treats.

Visit us at:

Gourmet LC
456 Coffee St Culinary Town, CT 67890

Welcome to Gourmet LC

Our working hours:

Monday to Thursday: 10 - 20

Friday to Sunday: 10 - 23

Contact us:

(555) 123-4567

Address:

Gourmet LC

456 Coffee St Culinary Town, CT 67890

item.title: Jazz Night Extravaganza: Sip and Swing in Style
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Transport yourself to the soulful world of jazz with live performances featuring upbeat rhythms and
improvisational flair. Treat your ears to smooth saxophone solos and melodic bass lines while savoring
expertly crafted coffee blends. Whether you’re a jazz connoisseur or just a curious listener, you’ll be
swept up in the electric ambiance. Grab a friend, snag a seat, and let the music guide you through
an unforgettable night of swing and style.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Jazz Night Extravaganza: Sip and Swing in Style
Jazz Night Extravaganza: Sip and Swing in Style
Jazz Night Extravaganza: Sip and Swing in Style

item.title: Poetry & Coffee: Open Mic Night for Aspiring Artists
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Discover the power of the spoken word at our Poetry & Coffee Open Mic Night. Step up to the mic to
share your original poems, short stories, or creative musings, or simply listen and soak in the artistry
of others. Pair the experience with one of our artisan coffees for an unforgettable evening that celebrates
self-expression, community, and the beauty of language. All are welcome—no prior stage experience required.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Poetry & Coffee: Open Mic Night for Aspiring Artists
Poetry & Coffee: Open Mic Night for Aspiring Artists
Poetry & Coffee: Open Mic Night for Aspiring Artists

item.title: Game Night: Coffee, Fun & Friends
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Round up your friends for an exciting night of board games, card games, and fast-paced fun! Whether you prefer
classics like Chess and Scrabble or modern favorites like Codenames and Ticket to Ride, our Game Night has
something for everyone. Fuel your competitive spirit with freshly brewed coffee and light snacks, and enjoy
an evening of laughter, strategy, and friendly rivalry in a cozy, welcoming atmosphere.

item.title: Vintage Movie Marathon: A Night of Nostalgia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Escape into the golden era of film with a back-to-back screening of timeless classics. Sink into a comfortable
seat, sip on our signature coffee blends, and immerse yourself in a nostalgic movie marathon. Each film has
been carefully curated for its unique charm and historical significance. Whether you’re a seasoned cinephile
or a curious newcomer, get ready to relive the magic of old Hollywood in a relaxed, café-style setting.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Vintage Movie Marathon: A Night of Nostalgia
Vintage Movie Marathon: A Night of Nostalgia
Vintage Movie Marathon: A Night of Nostalgia

item.title: Paint & Sip: Create Art with a Cup of Inspiration
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Unleash your inner artist with a paintbrush in one hand and a comforting cup of coffee in the other.
Our resident art instructor will guide you through step-by-step techniques, ensuring that everyone—regardless
of skill level—walks away with their own masterpiece. Swap tips and share laughs with friends, and let your
creativity flow amid the aroma of freshly ground beans. No prior experience necessary—just a passion for
artistic expression!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Paint & Sip: Create Art with a Cup of Inspiration
Paint & Sip: Create Art with a Cup of Inspiration
Paint & Sip: Create Art with a Cup of Inspiration

item.title: Book Club Brunch: Literary Discussions Over Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Feed your mind—and your stomach—at our Book Club Brunch. Join fellow literary enthusiasts to discuss
this month’s featured novel while enjoying freshly baked pastries and your choice of coffee beverages.
Whether you’re a seasoned reader or just looking for a laid-back way to explore new titles, you’ll find
lively conversation and warm hospitality in our cozy corner booth. Share your perspective and leave
inspired for the next great read.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Book Club Brunch: Literary Discussions Over Coffee
Book Club Brunch: Literary Discussions Over Coffee
Book Club Brunch: Literary Discussions Over Coffee

item.title: Café Trivia Night: Test Your Knowledge Over Coffee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Gather your friends, put your thinking caps on, and come out for a fun-filled Trivia Night at our café.
From pop culture to history, challenge yourself across a range of entertaining categories. Sip on
specialty lattes and cappuccinos as you race to answer questions and rack up points. Great prizes await
the winning team, and the lively atmosphere makes this the perfect midweek break for trivia buffs and
coffee lovers alike.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Café Trivia Night: Test Your Knowledge Over Coffee
Café Trivia Night: Test Your Knowledge Over Coffee
Café Trivia Night: Test Your Knowledge Over Coffee

item.title: Craft Beer & Coffee Tasting: A Unique Flavor Experience
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Indulge in a one-of-a-kind taste adventure combining the richness of artisanal coffee with the complexity of
local craft beers. Our expert baristas and brewmasters will guide you through flavor pairings designed to
highlight each drink’s distinctive notes. Learn about the origins of the beans and hops, gain insight into
roasting and brewing techniques, and treat your palate to an unforgettable experience that celebrates
both boldness and balance.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Craft Beer & Coffee Tasting: A Unique Flavor Experience
Craft Beer & Coffee Tasting: A Unique Flavor Experience
Craft Beer & Coffee Tasting: A Unique Flavor Experience
Craft Beer & Coffee Tasting: A Unique Flavor Experience

item.title: Music Open Mic: A Night for Local Talent
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Calling all music enthusiasts! Showcase your skills or simply enjoy live performances at our Music Open Mic Night.
From acoustic guitar sets to soulful vocal renditions, this event brings together local talent from diverse genres.
Whether you’re an up-and-coming musician or a devoted fan, join us for a memorable evening. Savor a warm cup
of coffee and support your community’s burgeoning artists in an atmosphere buzzing with creativity.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Music Open Mic: A Night for Local Talent
Music Open Mic: A Night for Local Talent
Music Open Mic: A Night for Local Talent
Music Open Mic: A Night for Local Talent

item.title: Sunday Yoga & Coffee Morning: Relax, Recharge, Refresh
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Kick-start your Sunday with an energizing yoga session followed by a soothing cup of freshly brewed coffee.
Our certified yoga instructor will guide you through gentle stretches and mindful breathing exercises to
help you unwind and boost your mood. Afterward, chat with fellow participants over a delicious coffee,
specially curated to complement your morning routine. Embrace a balanced lifestyle, recharge your mind,
and set the perfect tone for the week ahead.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Sunday Yoga & Coffee Morning: Relax, Recharge, Refresh
Sunday Yoga & Coffee Morning: Relax, Recharge, Refresh
Sunday Yoga & Coffee Morning: Relax, Recharge, Refresh
Sunday Yoga & Coffee Morning: Relax, Recharge, Refresh

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to Gourmet Cafè

Nestled in the heart of Culinary Town, Gourmet LC is your destination for expertly crafted coffee, artisanal teas, and freshly baked treats. From velvety lattes to delicate green teas, every item is prepared with precision using locally sourced ingredients. Our mission is to create a welcoming space where exceptional flavors meet eco-friendly practices.

☕

1,000+ Cups Brewed Weekly

⭐

4.8/5 Customer Rating

🌱

Ethical & Locally Sourced

Café Quality Crafted with Care

We roast premium Arabica beans and organic teas in small batches, crafted by expert baristas using precision techniques. Our pastry chefs bake fresh daily with local ingredients, served in eco-friendly packaging. Every detail fuels exceptional coffee experiences.

1

Sourcing the Finest Beans

We carefully select premium coffee beans from ethical farms to ensure deep, rich flavors in every cup.

2

Careful Roasting & Brewing

Our beans are roasted in small batches and brewed using expert techniques to extract the best flavors and aromas.

3

Serving with Care & Love

Every cup is thoughtfully presented to provide an inviting and delightful experience for our guests.

Meet our brew masters

Our passionate team of coffee artisans and pastry chefs dedicate themselves to crafting exceptional experiences in every cup and bite.

Jordan Brewster

Head Barista at Gourmet LC

Certified Q Grader with 12 years experience crafting perfect espresso blends. Creator of our signature lavender-honey latte and cold brew selections.

George Croissant

Master Pastry Chef at Gourmet LC

Le Cordon Bleu-trained baker specializing in French patisserie. Creator of our bestselling almond croissants and seasonal fruit tarts.
